snippet: The United States attorney for New York’s Eastern District signed off on a settlement that would return $447,000 seized from a Long Island business under civil asset forfeiture.
abstract: Loretta E Lynch, United States attorney for New York’s Eastern District, agrees to settlement that will return $447,000 seized from Long Island company Bi-County Distributors under controversial federal law known as civil asset forfeiture.
lead_paragraph: The United States attorney for New York’s Eastern District signed off on a settlement that would return $447,000 seized from a Long Island business under civil asset forfeiture.

headline.main: $447,000 Seized by Government Will Be Returned to Business
headline.print_headline: $447,000 Seized by Government Will Be Returned to Business
